mapper.select: SELECT codetype,conf.name,conf.desc,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM vv_sys_code WHERE codetype=conf.codetype) codecount FROM vv_sys_code_conf conf WHERE editable=0 and codetype=#{codetype}

SELECT menu_id,menu_name,menu_url,open_power FROM vv_sys_menu where 1=1 and menu_id=#{menu_id} and (open_power IS NULL OR open_power='0' or ( open_power='1' and exists (select 1 from vv_sys_user_menu where user_id=#{user_id} and menu_id=vv_sys_menu.menu_id)) )
mapper.update: update vv_sys_code_conf set vv_sys_code_conf.desc=#{desc} where codetype=#{codetype}
